title: Items
description: Augmented `elements`. `Items` MUST be a single `element` with a class(es) added. If an `item` uses a `generic` it MUST use the same name for the first class that extends it. The first class SHOULD NOT add any additional rules.

sections.title: Headings
description: MUST only modify standalone `h1` - `h6`. MUST use modifier format (`-heading -modifier`). Headings that are parts of `collections` MUST use child selector format (`parent__child`).

sections.title: Icons
description: Most icons use the `sprite($file_name)` mixin provided by `/src/scss/00_bits/_sprites.scss`. Variable names are determined by svg file names in `src/icons/`. SVG file names MUST be named in snake case (eg. `snake_case`).
Icons not using the `sprite($file_name)` mixin SHOULD be CSS only (eg. CSS triangles below).
